extent: U.S. special operations troops
Sentence: IRBIL , Iraq ( AP ) Kurdish militiamen and U.S. special operations troops linked up with more than 1,000 U.S. Army paratroopers Thursday to secure the area around a strategic air strip , as the first large coalition ground force in northern Iraq began opening another front against Saddam Hussein 's regime .

extent: more than 1,000 U.S. Army paratroopers

extent: The Army's 173rd Airborne Brigade
Sentence: The Army 's 173rd Airborne Brigade , including elite Army Rangers , jumped out of low-flying C-17 transport planes under cover of darkness Wednesday and secured a snow-dusted airfield , which will be used to bring in supplies and support personnel .
